short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get AI-powered social replies with one click! Analyze comments, get instant responses. AI post creation coming soon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The first version supports XiaoHongShu and BiliBili, will support more social medias like Instagram, Tiktok, etc..

As we know, replying comments proactively helps attracting more eyes and boosting the post. The system tends to promote the posts that have more interaction between creators and viewers.
The extension helps social media creator to reply comments and create post with LLMs, the extension analyze the html page, locate the comments chain for which user clicks 'reply' button, and use LLMs to generate a message to reply the comment. 

It also helps creator to generate post (not implemented yet)
